law.catch_line: Parole for violent offenders -- Applicability of section to victim of domestic violence or abuse -- Time of offense -- Prohibition against award of credit.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 19, effective March 25, 2015. -- Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.99, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 11, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 27, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 77, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2013). 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 2, provides that Section 1 of the Act, which included an amendment to this statute, shall be known as the "Bryan Durman Act."
